ROOT.QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT hd_donord WHS_NUM, dh_numcde PO_NUM, hd_livrea STORE_NUM, dh_cproin ITEM_CODE, ar_libpro ITEM_DESC, (SELECT LISTAGG( rp_allee, '','') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY rp_allee DESC) FROM tb_pick@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE rp_donord=hd_donord and rp_cproin=ar_cproin AND rp_arprom=ar_arprom AND rp_ilogis=rp_ilogis) AISLE, (SELECT pi_li2pos from tb_parl@HEINENS_STK_PROD where pi_lang = ''GB'' AND pi_postex=dh_statut and pi_tablex = ''SCD'' ) Status, dh_qtei/dcduauvc QTY_ORDERED, dh_qterep/dcduauvc QTY_PREP, to_char(dh_datmod,''MM/DD/RR'') PREP_DATE, ( SELECT SUM(NVL(storeai, 0) + NVL(storeal, 0) - NVL(storeav, 0) + NVL(storeae, 0) + NVL(storeac, 0) - NVL(storear, 0)) qte FROM stocouch@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stocinr=dcdcinr AND stosite=hd_donord AND stotpos=0)/dcduauvc as "INVENTORY (Case)" FROM tb_hlcde@HEINENS_STK_PROD, tb_hecde@HEINENS_STK_PROD, tb_art@HEINENS_STK_PROD, cdedetcde@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE TRUNC(dh_datmod)=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND dh_qtei > dh_qterep AND dh_statut != ''3'' AND dh_numcde =hd_numcde AND ar_cproin=dh_cproin AND dcdcexcde=dh_numcde AND dcdcode=ar_cproin ORDER BY WHS_NUM ASC, PO_NUM ASC
